subject: Load cell pedals
description_text:
Hello,

Is it possible to use Simsonn pedals with the Fanatec CSL DD?

I want to buy load cell pedals and I would like to know if it is possible to use both together.

Best regards,
Ruben Reis

Enviado de Outlook para Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi ruben reis,  If you’re playing racing games downloaded from Steam on a PC, our pedals are compatible with almost all wheelbases, since the pedals connect directly to your computer via USB.
